name: CAS
description:
CAS :: Customizable Attachment System

changeNote:
Fixes:
* Katanas and some custom weapons don't fit in belt
* Female characters getting the male armor mesh
* Couldn't remove items from CAS when the item is no longer in inventory
* Thralls didn't work properly on servers
* Item meshes remaining in-game on actor death or logout
* Bow textures looking weird
* Medicinal Pouch can't be crafted
* Attached armors are sometimes shown in T-pose
author: Thraxerrrr
